title: recipes_Buttermilk_Syrup
text:
Title: Buttermilk Syrup.
.
Description: This is a great homemade syrup that we found at a little B&B in South Dakota. This syrup is wonderful on hot, fresh blueberry pancakes..
.
Ingredients:.
- 1.5 cups white sugar.
- 0.75 cup buttermilk.
- 0.5 cup butter.
- 2 tablespoons corn syrup.
- 1 teaspoon baking soda.
- 2 teaspoons vanilla extract.
.
Instructions:.
- In a saucepan, stir together the sugar, buttermilk, butter, corn syrup, and baking soda. Bring to a boil, and cook for 7 minutes. Remove from the heat, and stir in the vanilla..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 137 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 21 g.
cholesterolContent: 16 mg.
proteinContent: 0 g.
saturatedFatContent: 4 g.
sodiumContent: 133 mg.
sugarContent: 20 g.
fatContent: 6 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 16 servings.
